name: BE SAIGONER ON OUR SCOOTER AND ENJOY THE LOCAL LIFE
description: Do you know which is the best experience when you travel to Vietnam, especially in Saigon? This is the crazy traffic. Not by walking, not by car, the best way to feel it is scooter. You will have the feeling like a local people here when you just sit back our scooter and enjoy not only famous places in Saigon, but also some ordinary places, some hidden beauty of Saigon. Zoom the city on back of scooter and soak up the culture, take a peek at the history, the architecture, and taste so many street food of Saigon.Let's discover with us on scooter, you will have the best experience like a real Saigoner
